    • Method Detail

      • exists

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/exists")
public Result exists(@FormParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                        java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="project")
                                                                                        java.lang.String project,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="parents")
                                                                                        java.lang.String parents,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="file")
                                                                                        java.lang.String file)
        Checks if a file exists.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        parents - (optional) The parents directory. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        file - (optional) The file name. Null if there is not file name.
        Returns:
        A result containing the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED if the user is not valid;
        - RESTResultCodes.PROJECT_NOT_FOUND if the project is not found;
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file exists;
        - RESTResultCodes.FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST if the file does not exist;
        - RESTResultCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if some error occurs.

      • create

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/create")
public Result create(@FormParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                        java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="project")
                                                                                        java.lang.String project,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="parents")
                                                                                        java.lang.String parents,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="file")
                                                                                        java.lang.String file,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="directory")
                                                                                        java.lang.String directory)
        Creates a new file or directory.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        parents - (optional) The parents directory. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        file - The file name.
        directory - True if it is a directory or false if it is a file.
        Returns:
        A result containing the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED if the user is not valid;
        - RESTResultCodes.PROJECT_NOT_FOUND if the project is not found;
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file was successfully created;
        - RESTResultCodes.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS if the file already exists;
        - RESTResultCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if some error occurs.

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/delete")
public Result delete(@FormParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                        java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="project")
                                                                                        java.lang.String project,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="parents")
                                                                                        java.lang.String parents,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="file")
                                                                                        java.lang.String file)
        Deletes a file or directory.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        parents - (optional) The parents directory. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        file - The file name.
        Returns:
        A result containing the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED if the user is not valid;
        - RESTResultCodes.PROJECT_NOT_FOUND if the project is not found;
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file was successfully deleted;
        - RESTResultCodes.FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST if the file does not exist;
        - RESTResultCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if some error occurs.

      • move

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/move")
public Result move(@FormParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                    java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                    @FormParam(value="project")
                                                                                    java.lang.String project,
                                                                                    @FormParam(value="parentsFrom")
                                                                                    java.lang.String parentsFrom,
                                                                                    @FormParam(value="fileName")
                                                                                    java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                    @FormParam(value="parentsTo")
                                                                                    java.lang.String parentsTo)
        Moves a file.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        parentsFrom - (optional) The parents directory where the file is. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        fileName - The name of the file.
        parentsTo - (optional) The parents directory where the file will be placed. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        Returns:
        A result containing the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED if the user is not valid;
        - RESTResultCodes.PROJECT_NOT_FOUND if the project is not found;
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file was successfully moved;
        - RESTResultCodes.FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST if the file does not exist;
        - RESTResultCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if some error occurs.

      • upload

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="multipart/form-data")
 @Path(value="/upload")
public Result upload(java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String parents,
                                                                                                                                java.io.InputStream is,
                                                                                                                                org.glassfish.jersey.media.multipart.FormDataContentDisposition content,
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String override)
        Uploads a file.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        parents - (optional) The parents directory. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        is - The file.
        content - The file content.
        override - True if the file already exists and want to override.
        Returns:
        A result containing the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED if the user is not valid;
        - RESTResultCodes.PROJECT_NOT_FOUND if the project is not found;
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file was uploaded;
        - RESTResultCodes.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS if the file already exists;
        - RESTResultCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if some error occurs.

      • download

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/octet-stream")
 @Path(value="/download")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response download(@FormParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                                                       @FormParam(value="project")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String project,
                                                                                                                       @FormParam(value="parents")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String parents,
                                                                                                                       @FormParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String file)
        Downloads a file.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        parents - (optional) The parents directory. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        file - The file name.
        Returns:
        A streaming for download the file and a result containing the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file download was successful;
        -RESTResultCodes.NO_CONTENT if the file was not found;

      • copy

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/copy")
public Result copy(@FormParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                    java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                    @FormParam(value="project")
                                                                                    java.lang.String project,
                                                                                    @FormParam(value="source")
                                                                                    java.lang.String source,
                                                                                    @FormParam(value="destination")
                                                                                    java.lang.String destination)
        Copies a file.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        source - The source of the file.
        destination - The destination of the copy.
        Returns:
        A result containing the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED if the user is not valid;
        - RESTResultCodes.PROJECT_NOT_FOUND if the project is not found;
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file was successfully copied;
        - RESTResultCodes.FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST if the file does not exist;
        - RESTResultCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if some error occurs.

      • find

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/find")
public FileResult find(@FormParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                        java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="project")
                                                                                        java.lang.String project,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="parents")
                                                                                        java.lang.String parents,
                                                                                        @FormParam(value="file")
                                                                                        java.lang.String file)
        Finds a file representation
        Parameters:
        uuid - Universally unique identifier of the user.
        project - A project owned by the user.
        parents - (optional) The parents directory. Null if there is no parents. Parents are separated using the '/' character.
        file - (optional) The file name. Null if there is not file name.
        Returns:
        A result containing the file information and the code of the result.
        - RESTResultCodes.USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED if the user is not valid;
        - RESTResultCodes.PROJECT_NOT_FOUND if the project is not found;
        - RESTResultCodes.OK if the file was found;
        - RESTResultCodes.FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST if the file does not exist;
        - RESTResultCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if some error occurs.
